    Subclasses of UnaryParserDecorator in koopa.core.parsers.combinators
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    At
    This checks whether the stream is in a position where we can expect to match a given ParserCombinator.
    class 
    Balancing
    This ParserCombinator tracks the nesting (opening and closing) of parentheses (or whatever you tell it to balance) during the matching of another given ParserCombinator.
    class 
    Balancing.Balancer
    This observes the Data being pushed/popped by the Stream.
    class 
    Closure
     
    class 
    Counting
    This ParserCombinator sets up a context during parsing for counting the number of matches a given ParserCombinator has within that context.
    class 
    Counting.Counter
     
    class 
    LimitedTo
    This ParserCombinator will attempt to match a given ParserCombinator, while restricting the stream for that one to never pass a positive match for a limiting ParserCombinator.
    class 
    MatchTree
    ...
    class 
    Nested
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator, but only if we're inside an unbalanced context (as determined via Balancing.Balancer.isBalanced()).
    class 
    Not
    This checks whether the stream is in a position where we can expect to not match a given ParserCombinator.
    class 
    NotEmpty
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator once, but will only accept its match if it was non-empty.
    class 
    NotNested
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator, but only if we're not inside an unbalanced context (as determined via Balancing.Balancer.isBalanced()).
    class 
    Once
    A ParserCombinator which tries to match another one, but never more than once within an active Counting's context.
    class 
    Optional
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator once, but still pass if it couldn't.
    class 
    Plus
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator as many times as it can, with a minimum of 1.
    class 
    SkipTo
    This ParserCombinator consumes tokens until it has reached a certain point in the stream, as identified by a given ParserCombinator.
    class 
    Star
    A ParserCombinator which will try to match a given ParserCombinator as many times as it can.
    class 
    UpTo
    This ParserCombinator will attempt to match a given ParserCombinator, while restricting the stream for that one to never pass a positive match for a limiting ParserCombinator.
    class 
    WithOption
    This ParserCombinator sets an Opt for the duration of matching another ParserCombinator.
